TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national . He was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the applicant , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant brought proceedings against the ORG and ORG . He claimed that the value of his personal savings , which he had deposited with ORG , had significantly dropped following economic reforms , and that the ORG had not properly discharged its obligation to revalue the deposits in ORG банк ) in order to offset the effects of inflation , even though it had assumed that obligation under LAW of GPE enacted on DATE ( Федеральный закон « О восстановлении и защите сбережений граждан Российской PERSON , hereinafter DATE “ Savings Act ” ) .
On DATE , ORG of GPE ( ORG районный суд г. PERSON ) dismissed the applicant ’s case , having found that the current legislation did not create a right to compensation as claimed by the applicant .

On appeal , this finding was confirmed by ORG ( ORG городской суд ) on DATE . It was held , inter alia , that the applicant had benefited from preliminary compensation in respect of his savings pending the launch of the full - scale compensation envisaged in LAW .
On DATE , ORG informed the applicant that his devalued savings would be converted into special bonds as set out in LAW only after all the necessary subordinate legislation had been passed .

By LAW , the ORG guarantees the restoration and preservation of the value of monies deposited with ORG before DATE . The LAW recognises guaranteed savings as an internal ORG debt secured by ORG property and assets at the ORG ’s disposal . It provides that savings shall be converted into special ORG bonds guaranteeing a purchasing power equivalent to that of the national currency in DATE . LAW provides that the conversion shall be carried out on the basis of relevant federal laws .

Pending full implementation of LAW , several presidential decrees and governmental orders have been passed to enable certain socially vulnerable groups of the population to receive partial reimbursement of their savings , e.g. Presidential Decrees no .
